data.name: Miska's Cave
data.detailed_description:
Miska's Cave is an action-centric side scroller with strategic components and animated with pixel art. Play as Miska, the inexperienced rabbit who wishes to conquer the cave. The only thing between Miska and her goal is the tunnels crowded with dangerous enemies. With her crystal sword and gravity-defying abilities, Miska aims to eventually overcome the challenges of the cave. Fortunately, Miska is not alone during her journey. Her friends can improve her physical capabilities and grant magical powers to help her reach her goal. If you appreciate pixel art and love challenging games, Miska's Cave is for you.

  • Polish your reflexes against a variety of enemies
  • Complete challenging tasks provided by the characters
  • Test your skills in 24 different levels with unique challenges and monster patterns
  • Unlock new spells and magical bullets to defeat tricky enemies

data.short_description: Miska's Cave is a unique action-centric side scroller with strategic components and animated with pixel art. If you love completing challenging games that require varying strategies, this game is for you.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Russian, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.7.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.1 ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2nd Generation Intel Core HD Graphics (2000/3000), 512MB
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 16:9 recommended
